please.\""},{"lineNumber":86152,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、お、おい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-hey!\""},{"lineNumber":86153,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おい、人間」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, human.\""},{"lineNumber":86154,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おめぇ、強かったぜ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You were strong.\""},{"lineNumber":86155,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、今のままじゃ到底駄目だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But as you are now, you are absolutely no good."},{"lineNumber":86156,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に俺を従えさせてぇなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you truly want to make me obey you,"},{"lineNumber":86157,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もっと強くなるこった」","translatedEnglishLine":"You need to become stronger.\""},{"lineNumber":86158,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最低でも……俺に勝てるくらい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At the very least... strong enough to beat me.\""},{"lineNumber":86159,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ、石丸なら軽くやったぜ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh, I handled Ishimaru easily, you know?\""},{"lineNumber":86160,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、ムカムカーーッ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Grr, that's so irritating!\""},{"lineNumber":86161,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いちいち死んだ奴を引き合いに出すな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Don’t keep bringing up the dead guys every time!\""},{"lineNumber":86162,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……あの黒部殿に見込みありと、","translatedEnglishLine":"(…To have that Kurobe-dono say I have potential,"},{"lineNumber":86163,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ここまで言わせるとはな）","translatedEnglishLine":"to make him say this much…) "},{"lineNumber":86164,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あばよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"See ya.\""},{"lineNumber":86165,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、待てー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, wait!\""},{"lineNumber":86166,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけ言い残して黒部は去ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"With only that said, Kurobe left."},{"lineNumber":86167,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、行っちまった……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"H-he's gone...\""},{"lineNumber":86168,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おい、俺達はどうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, what should we do now?\""},{"lineNumber":86169,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ど、どうするったって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-what do you mean what to do...\""},{"lineNumber":86170,"originalJapaneseLine":"慌てたのは黒部を盟主にしようと","translatedEnglishLine":"Those who panicked were the youkai gathered to make Kurobe their chief."},{"lineNumber":86171,"originalJapaneseLine":"集まった妖怪達であった。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were the gathered youkai."},{"lineNumber":86172,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Phew...\""},{"lineNumber":86173,"originalJapaneseLine":"「聞け！　ここにいる皆の者！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Listen! Everyone here!"},{"lineNumber":86174,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そして、全ての妖怪よ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"And all you youkai!\""},{"lineNumber":86175,"originalJapaneseLine":"一喝。","translatedEnglishLine":"A sharp shout."},{"lineNumber":86176,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけで辺りの注目は一気に政宗に集まった。","translatedEnglishLine":"With just that, all attention quickly turned to Masamune."},{"lineNumber":86177,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、この瞬間も魔物は","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even at this very moment, the demons"},{"lineNumber":86178,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このJAPANへの侵攻の準備を進めている！」","translatedEnglishLine":"are preparing to invade this JAPAN!\""},{"lineNumber":86179,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我あろうと言う者は全て、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"All who consider themselves worthy,"},{"lineNumber":86180,"originalJapaneseLine":"　モロッコに集結せよ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"assemble in Morocco!\""},{"lineNumber":86181,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……政宗様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, um... Masamune-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":86182,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言葉はいらん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No words are needed.\""},{"lineNumber":86183,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺は先に戦場にて待つ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will wait ahead on the battlefield.\""},{"lineNumber":86184,"originalJapaneseLine":"多くの言葉は使わず、","translatedEnglishLine":"Without many words,"},{"lineNumber":86185,"originalJapaneseLine":"政宗はそう行って背を向けてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Masamune said that and turned his back."},{"lineNumber":86186,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ど、どうする？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...W-what do we do?"},{"lineNumber":86187,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うのか、俺達？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are we going to fight?\""},{"lineNumber":86188,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、JAPANのピンチだ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, JAPAN is in trouble,"},{"lineNumber":86189,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦うのはいいけどよぉ……","translatedEnglishLine":"It's fine to fight, but..."},{"lineNumber":86190,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうすると独眼流の方を盟主と認めることに","translatedEnglishLine":"That means recognizing the One-Eyed Style as our leader."},{"lineNumber":86191,"originalJapaneseLine":"「つったって、黒部様がいなくなった以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But since Kurobe-sama is gone,"},{"lineNumber":86192,"originalJapaneseLine":"　盟主は政宗しか……","translatedEnglishLine":"the only possible chief is Masamune...\""},{"lineNumber":86193,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":86194,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！　お、お町様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek! O-O-machi-sama!?\""},{"lineNumber":86195,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不満を持つ者も当然、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Those who are dissatisfied, naturally,"},{"lineNumber":86196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦えぬと逃げるも当然」","translatedEnglishLine":"and those who cannot fight and run away, naturally so.\""},{"lineNumber":86197,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":86198,"originalJapaneseLine":"「妖怪と人間が手を取り合う今このときは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"At this very moment when youkai and humans join hands,"},{"lineNumber":86199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全て梵天丸の悲願の一端……」","translatedEnglishLine":"it is all part of Bontemaru's heartfelt wish...\""},{"lineNumber":86200,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは我の個人的な願い」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is my personal wish."},{"lineNumber":86201,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頼む、どうか力を貸して欲しい」","translatedEnglishLine":"I beg of you, please lend me your strength.\""},{"lineNumber":86202,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えっ、あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah...\""},{"lineNumber":86203,"originalJapaneseLine":"お町が深く頭を下げる。","translatedEnglishLine":"O-machi bowed deeply."},{"lineNumber":86204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「では、モロッコにて待つ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, I will wait in Morocco...\""},{"lineNumber":86205,"originalJapaneseLine":"それきりお町もまた背を向けてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, O-machi also turned her back and left."},{"lineNumber":86206,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{ "lineNumber":86207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、えっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-well...\""},{ "lineNumber":86208,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当……どうするよ、俺達……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Really... what are we going to do...?\""},{ "lineNumber":86209,"originalJapaneseLine":"「う、うぅん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"U-um...\""},{ "lineNumber":86210,"originalJapaneseLine":"殺されるかと身構えていた妖怪達は","translatedEnglishLine":"The youkai who had been bracing themselves to be killed"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連れて行きたきゃ、勝手にしろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you want to take me along, do as you please."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、今のままじゃ到底駄目だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But as you are now, you are absolutely no good.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当に俺を従えさせてぇなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you truly want to make me obey you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もっと強くなるこった」
「最低でも……俺に勝てるくらい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At the very least... strong enough to beat me."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へっ、石丸なら軽くやったぜ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Heh, I handled Ishimaru easily, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いちいち死んだ奴を引き合いに出すな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don’t keep bringing up the dead guys every time!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （……あの黒部殿に見込みありと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (…To have that Kurobe-dono say I have potential,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで言わせるとはな）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: to make him say this much…)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけ言い残して黒部は去ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With only that said, Kurobe left.
Hey, what should we do now?"
"W-what do you mean what to do..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 慌てたのは黒部を盟主にしようと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Those who panicked were the youkai gathered to make Kurobe their chief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集まった妖怪達であった。
「聞け！　ここにいる皆の者！
それだけで辺りの注目は一気に政宗に集まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With just that, all attention quickly turned to Masamune.
"Even at this very moment, the demons

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このJAPANへの侵攻の準備を進めている！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are preparing to invade this JAPAN!"
"I will wait ahead on the battlefield."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 政宗はそう行って背を向けてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Masamune said that and turned his back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦うのはいいけどよぉ……
そうすると独眼流の方を盟主と認めることに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That means recognizing the One-Eyed Style as our leader.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「つったって、黒部様がいなくなった以上、

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the only possible chief is Masamune..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦えぬと逃げるも当然」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and those who cannot fight and run away, naturally so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「妖怪と人間が手を取り合う今このときは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this very moment when youkai and humans join hands,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全て梵天丸の悲願の一端……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it is all part of Bontemaru's heartfelt wish..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頼む、どうか力を貸して欲しい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I beg of you, please lend me your strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お町が深く頭を下げる。
それきりお町もまた背を向けてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, O-machi also turned her back and left.
"Really... what are we going to do...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 殺されるかと身構えていた妖怪達は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The youkai who had been bracing themselves to be killed

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
